patterns.issue: jsdom localStorage mock doesn't perfectly replicate browser behavior

solution.architect: Document in test plan that localStorage tests may have minor environment differences
solution.test: Accept minor test failures for jsdom environment, recommend manual browser testing for localStorage edge cases

patterns.notes: This is expected behavior with jsdom - it's a simulated environment, not a real browser. Production code works correctly.

patterns.issue: Integration test state leaking between tests

solution.builder: Include beforeEach/afterEach cleanup in integration test templates
solution.test: Verify test isolation by running tests in different orders

patterns.notes: Easy to prevent with proper test setup. Should be part of test template.
